short_description: bavaria petrol is a gas station based in germany.
long_description: finden sie die passende tankstelle in ihrer nähe oder entlang ihrer route. vertrauen sie auf die schonende und effiziente reinigung ihres autos. bei flexiblen öffnungszeiten können tanken, autopflege und einkaufen bequem und zeitsparend miteinander kombiniert werden. unser globales ziel: netto-null-co2-emissionen bis 2050.
generated_description: bavaria petrol, legally known as bavaria petrol gmbh & co. kg., is a german company that operates petrol stations across the country, offering a range of high-quality fuels including diesel, super, super plus, super e10, cng gas, and lpg gas. the company also provides additional services such as adblue additives for both cars and trucks, as well as top autowäsche (automotive wash services) and bistro services. bavaria petrol stations feature shops and bistros, providing customers with convenient access to snacks, beverages, and other everyday items. the company emphasizes high product and service quality, and it supports the global goal of net-zero co2 emissions by 2050.
